text: Soni (mwakumbusyani) lisiku lyatachasonganganya ŵanaose (nikwasalila yanti): “E jenumanja likuga lya achimajini! Chisimu mwatupiye achinaŵandu (ŵakwasochelesya).” Sano achimijao (majinio) mwa achinaŵandu chachiti: “Ambuje ŵetu! Twapatisyanaga ukoto sikati jetu, ni twaajiyiche ndema jetu ajila jamwatuŵichile (jakuwila).” (Allah) tachiti: “Moto ni liwuto lyenu lyakutamilichika, chim'be ŵandamo mwalakwemo ikaŵeje mwachasachile Allah (kuti ŵandu ŵasambi nambo ŵaliji ni chikulupi cha Tauhidi akopoche), chisimu Ambuje ŵenu ni Ŵalunda lwakusokoka, Ŵakumanyilila nnope.”
